message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $105.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $102.
I appreciate the concessions you're making, but I'm still a bit away from being comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $98.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close to my target price as possible. Would you be willing to go down to $88?
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $96.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
